keyPolicies.policyDescription: For years Greens have led the way on tackling climate chaos. Every vote for the Greens helps speed up climate action. This means cleaner energy, better transport, warmer homes and hundreds of thousands of new jobs.
Greens will deliver the radical change to end the climate emergency and provide a Green New Deal.
Greens will give power back to people to decide the way forward with a People's Vote. Greens would campaign to remain in the EU for the benefit of everyone.
David Williams is known for campaigning tirelessly on the NHS.

mentions.candidate: David is known in East Oxford for tireless campaigning on the NHS, the environment, and against austerity. He was elected as a councillor in 2006.

issues.brexitEurope: Westminster politicians have failed us all on Brexit. Greens will give power back to people to decide the way forward with a People's Vote. Greens would campaign to remain in the EU for the benefit of everyone.
issues.education: David is a believer in a clearer, brighter future through investment in public transport and free education.
issues.environment: Action on climate change now. Every vote for the Greens helps speed up climate action.
issues.health: David is known in East Oxford for tireless campaigning on the NHS.
issues.transport: This means cleaner energy, better transport, warmer homes and hundreds of thousands of new jobs.

community.content: Vote for a local Green MP.

leaflet.personalStatement: David is known in East Oxford for tireless campaigning on the NHS, the environment, and against austerity.

politicalExperience.achievements: In 2016 he opposed the massive cuts that Tory, Labour and Lib Dems voted through the County Council.

endorsements.endorsement: "Only a Green vote will prevent climate chaos, transform Britain whilst remaining in the EU, and elect more Green MPs that you can trust to keep the other parties honest. The time is now – please vote Green."
